description:
Robin`s flashback continues with the heartbreaking arrival of her mother - and the government`s cruel and brutal invasion of a peaceful island!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fated Mother and Daughter! The Mother`s Name Is Olvia!
Shukumei no Oyako! Sono Haha no Na wa Orubia!
Une mère et sa fille frappés par le destin ! Sa mère s`appelle Olivia !
Встреча мамы и ребёнка! Её зовут Ольвия!
宿命の母娘! その母の名はオルビア!
